mapper.update:
UPDATE data_league_rank_club SET
data_league_rank_club.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
data_league_rank_club.LeagueSubId = #{ leagueSubId },
data_league_rank_club.Grouping = #{ grouping },
data_league_rank_club.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_league_rank_club.ClubHistoryId = #{ clubHistoryId },
data_league_rank_club.Round = #{ round },
data_league_rank_club.Wins = #{ wins },
data_league_rank_club.Ties = #{ ties },
data_league_rank_club.Loses = #{ loses },
data_league_rank_club.Goals = #{ goals },
data_league_rank_club.GoalsA = #{ goalsA },
data_league_rank_club.GoalsD = #{ goalsD },
data_league_rank_club.Points = #{ points },
data_league_rank_club.Year = #{ year },
data_league_rank_club.EndYear = #{ endYear },
data_league_rank_club.PreRanking = #{ preRanking },
data_league_rank_club.Ranking = #{ ranking },
data_league_rank_club.RankingStatus = #{ rankingStatus },
data_league_rank_club.DisplayOrder = #{ displayOrder },
data_league_rank_club.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_league_rank_club.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
